content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia Müller. While discussing the apartment in Duisburg, my focus remains on achieving the highest possible rental price. Starting our negotiation, I propose a price of 1250 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your straightforwardness, Mister Schmidt. Given the location and the fact that it is unfurnished, I believe 900 Euros per month would be more suitable.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because insisting on such a significantly lower price would not be in line with maximizing my returns. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
